issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The module API reference includes runOnUiThread for the @Kroll.module and @Kroll.getProperty, setProperty annotations. However, support for this was as far as I know removed in 1.8. For reference, see point #18 under Specific Changes, below:

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Android+Module+Porting+Guide+for+1.8.0.1#AndroidModulePortingGuidefor1.8.0.1-Specificchanges
fields.summary: Android Module APIs include runOnUiThread annotation element removed in 1.8

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
